PATIENT_ID: TEST_TBI_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-20 20:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-20 20:15:00
Patient arrived via private vehicle with isolated lower extremity injury.
Mechanism: Twisted ankle while hiking.
Patient alert and oriented x4.
Glasgow Coma Scale (GCS): 15 (E4 V5 M6).
Neurological exam normal. No concerning findings on examination.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-20 20:30:00
Physical exam reveals isolated right ankle injury.
Neurovascular exam intact distally.
Patient ambulating with assistance.

[IMAGING] 2026-01-20 21:00:00
X-RAY RIGHT ANKLE

FINDINGS:
No fracture identified. Soft tissue swelling present.

IMPRESSION:
Ankle sprain, no fracture.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-20 21:15:00
Ankle sprain confirmed.
Discharge home with crutches and ankle brace.
Follow up with orthopedics in one week.
